metadata.name: Emotion
metadata.description:
Grief - Sadness - Anger - Guilt - Depression - Loneliness. 

All of these emotions are not just felt by humans.
I believe dogs have more emotions and they just cannot express it. They are the purest of souls on this planet. 

During one of my trips, I saw this dog looking at the grave. 
I tried to capture the moment which represents how a pet would grieve the loss of its human.
